id.title: CAVOTA: Agensi Digital Berbasis Performa & Hasil Nyata

seo.metaTitle: CAVOTA — Agensi Digital yang Fokus pada Penjualan
seo.metaDescription: Cavota bukan agensi biasa. Kami menggabungkan media buying, desain, dan automasi untuk satu tujuan: mendorong penjualan dan pertumbuhan bisnis nyata Anda.
seo.keywords: Cavota, Agensi Digital, Media Buying, Digital Marketing, Marketing Automation, Jakarta

structuredData.name: CAVOTA Agency
structuredData.description: Agensi digital berbasis performa yang menggabungkan sains media, desain, dan automasi untuk mendorong hasil bisnis nyata—bukan sekadar impresi.

sections.heading: Percuma Kreatif Kalau Nggak Menjual.
sections.subheading: Sistem kami: Strategi data, eksekusi presisi, & ahli mentorship. Kami percaya metrik terpenting adalah pertumbuhan bisnis Anda; bukan sekadar impresi kosong.

sections.note: Meningkatkan pangsa pasar melalui kampanye digital terintegrasi.
Memperkuat brand top-of-mind di kategori cat & bahan bangunan.
Menjalankan strategi portofolio brand untuk beragam segmen konsumen.
Mendorong akuisisi pengguna di skala nasional.

sections.text: Cukup dengan wacana. Siap bicara angka?

en.title: CAVOTA — Full-Service Advertising, Built for Outcomes.

seo.metaDescription: CAVOTA isn't your typical agency. We combine media buying, design, and automation for one purpose: driving sales and real business growth.
seo.keywords: CAVOTA, Digital Agency, Media Buying, Digital Marketing, Marketing Automation, Jakarta, Performance Marketing

structuredData.name: CAVOTA Agency
structuredData.description: Performance-driven digital agency combining media science, design, and automation to drive real business results—not just impressions.

sections.heading: Great Creative Means Nothing If It Doesn't Sell.
sections.subheading: Our system: Data strategy, precision execution, & expert mentorship. We believe the most important metric is your business growth; not empty impressions.

sections.note: Increasing market share through integrated digital campaigns.
Strengthening top-of-mind brand in paint & building materials category.
Running portfolio brand strategy for diverse consumer segments.
Driving user acquisition at national scale.

sections.text: Enough with the talk. Ready to discuss numbers?
